articles.author: Jeff Mason, Sarah Marsh
articles.title: German president urges US not to forgo allies as he honours Biden - Reuters
articles.description: Germany's President Frank-Walter Steinmeier said he hoped the United States would remember its allies were indispensable as he awarded President Joe Biden Germany's highest order of merit on Friday for services to transatlantic ties.

articles.title: South Korea says North Korea troop dispatch to Russia is 'grave security threat' - Reuters
articles.description: South Korea believes North Korea has sent troops to Russia, marking a grave security threat to the international community that Seoul will respond to with all available means, the presidential office said in a statement on Friday.
